results.title: Ameliorative effects of autophagy inducer, simvastatin on alcohol-induced liver disease in a rat model.
results.text_hl: Therefore, our findings suggest that treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ may be a useful approach in the management strategy of @<m>DISEASE_Liver_Diseases_Alcoholic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008108 @@@ALD@@@.
